name: getDynamicWebhooksForApp
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of the webhooks registered by the calling app.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** Only [Connect](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/#connect-apps) and [OAuth 2.0](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/oauth-2-3lo-apps) apps can use this operation.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
**errorMessages**: The list of error messages produced by this operation. For example, "input parameter 'key' must be provided"

**errors**: The list of errors by parameter returned by the operation. For example,"projectKey": "Project keys must start with an uppercase letter, followed by one or more uppercase alphanumeric characters."
**errorMessages**: The list of error messages produced by this operation. For example, "input parameter 'key' must be provided"

**errors**: The list of errors by parameter returned by the operation. For example,"projectKey": "Project keys must start with an uppercase letter, followed by one or more uppercase alphanumeric characters."
